para.literallayout:
This tutorial will introduce the developers on how to setup development environment for working with Spring Dynamic Modules (DM) for OSGi™ platform project using currently available tools based on Eclipse IDE, Eclipse Equinox OSGi™ container and Eclipse Maven plug-in. For more information on the tools used please refer to the following websites:
Spring DM - http://www.springframework.org/osgi OSGi™ - http://www.osgi.org/Main/HomePage Eclipse IDE – http://eclipse.org Maven - http://maven.apache.org/ Eclipse Equinox - http://www.eclipse.org/equinox/
